name: St Helens Marriage Index
description: An online database of marriage in the St Helens area between 1536 & 2010. Built using React and Azure technologies the site takes years of historical records and makes it easy & fast to search through them.

name: Homeflix
description: A clone of Netflix using React JS, Azure Cosmos DB & Azure Functions. The app has full authentication using JWT & encryption for security and allows a use to search & play videos held within the library.

name: Re-a11y
description: A website to host content about accessibility & perform basic accessibility tests on an url. The site makes use of Azure Functions to scan a given url & return the most important issues of any given url.

name: Notion News
description: A small news website built using NextJS and powered by Notion as a pseudo CMS. The app uses NextJS and server side rendering to display news articles that are stored in Notion and accessed through the Notion client. A simple Bootstrap implementation is used for styling with Sass for customisation.

name: Mappin
description: App to store locations of where a user has travelled to using the MapBox API. The app has server powered by ExpressJS and uses Mongoose to connec to MongoDB with user registration & login functionality. On the client side, React is used to show a Single Page App, Axios is used to interact with the server & Material UI is used to style the app.

name: Devhub
description: Designed to help developers in a few simple ways; sharing code, keeping notes & managing their portfolio. The app functions as a pseudo CMS for a developers portfolio, exposing their projects via a REST API that can be consumed by their personal portfolio.

name: Pokedex
description: Built using Vanilla JavaScript, this project is a simple consumer of the Poke API. A user can filter through the original 151 Pokemon and see some very basic information on each of them. The PaperCSS library was used for styling to complete the 'minimal' effect & keep the size of the app extremely small.

name: Tensorflow Predictions
description: A short project to start learning TensorFlow JS. This project aims to predict a cars miles per gallon by taking mpg & horsepower as inputs. In this project the data was loaded, a model was created & trained before making some predictions based on more input data. All of this was visualised using tfjs-vis library.

name: Homeflix Mobile
description: An iOS app for the Homeflix application built using React Native. The app is made to provide the main functionality of the web app that lets users consume Movies & TV Shows and make use of the native features of iOS such as Airplay.

name: Kaizen
description: A larger project combining a number of previous ideas. Kaizen is targeted at helping new developers by providing tools to help the learning process. Two public API's are available for developers to build their own apps. TypeScript is used extensively to produce more reliability over time as well as a relational database.
